0.9.2.name: wordpress/wp-sos-donate
0.9.2.description: With WP-SOS-Donate you can simply add a sidebar widget for help donation e.g for haiti. After the plugin is activated, you can drag and drop WP-SOS-Donate Widget to your Sidebar. You can choose your own headline, the color of the subline, the charity link and the picture in the widget. If this is not enough for your site, you can define your own template.
